name: title
description: Lesson title

name: description
description: Short lesson description

name: author
description: Comma-separated list of authors

name: date
description: Created at / last updated

name: language
description: Language identifier (either `en-US`, `de`, `fr`, `it`, `pt`, or `sv`)

name: splashScreenTimeout
description: Timeout until the landing page vanishes (in milliseconds)

name: require
description: Data sets, JavaScript libraries, or other files to load

name: type
description: Either `presentation` or `page` (default)

name: lesson
description: Lesson name on server

name: namespace
description: Lesson namespace on server

name: logo
description: URL for logo to be displayed on landing page

name: server
description: ISLE server address

name: state
description: Lesson state variables

name: hideStatusBar
description: Hide the statusbar (e.g., for lessons where users should not login)

name: removeStatusBar
description: Completely remove statusbar (reduces bundle size)

name: removeToolbar
description: Remove the widget toolbar in the lower-left corner

name: toolbar
description: A list of widgets to be displayed in the toolbar (each with a `name`, `component`, and font-awesome `icon`). To remove the calculator or queue, supply new components with the names `calculator` and `queue`, respectively.

name: hideProgressBar
description: Hide the progressbar, which shows a user's score, time spent, and avatar image (e.g., when using ISLE for a one-time lesson outside of a course)

name: hideVoiceControl
description: Hide the icon in the statusbar to toggle on and off voice control

name: noLoginDismiss
description: Do not automatically dismiss the signup/login notification window

name: fixedView
description: Disables the scrollbars and any zoom and move events and in ISLE lesson (e.g. useful for Sketchpad-only lessons on mobile devices)

name: css
description: Absolute or relative path to CSS file to be loaded

name: style
description: Inline CSS rules to be appended to the head of the HTML document

name: license
description: License under which materials are released

name: version
description: Version number of the lesson (major.minor.patch)
